name: places/ChIJxd6mE_BYwokR9x3fxAYpcRU
adrFormatAddress: 781 5th Ave, New York, NY 10022-1046, USA

editorialSummary.text: Renowned, upscale 1927 hotel overlooking Central Park, offering elegant rooms & high-end shops.

originalText.text: The Club Doubles: delightful and magnificent ambiance, with à stunning decoration, peaceful, elegant. The staff is highly professional and the meals are delicious. Important and very good wine list..

text.text: The Club Doubles: delightful and magnificent ambiance, with à stunning decoration, peaceful, elegant. The staff is highly professional and the meals are delicious. Important and very good wine list..

originalText.text: The hotel staff were amazing. The room was comfy but would I say 3000+ for a few days comfy. No. Park was across the street but the view was the courtyard. It’s just a cement square with no activity. Only problem I had was the room had an odor when we would turn the air off.

text.text: The hotel staff were amazing. The room was comfy but would I say 3000+ for a few days comfy. No. Park was across the street but the view was the courtyard. It’s just a cement square with no activity. Only problem I had was the room had an odor when we would turn the air off.

originalText.text: We stayed twice this hotel. one of America's most beautiful historic hotels.  The hotel and rooms are very clean, only in some rooms there is noise from the air conditioner at night.  the employees are very polite and helpful but one of the employees in third party  restaurant they work with is very rude and not helpful.

text.text: We stayed twice this hotel. one of America's most beautiful historic hotels.  The hotel and rooms are very clean, only in some rooms there is noise from the air conditioner at night.  the employees are very polite and helpful but one of the employees in third party  restaurant they work with is very rude and not helpful.

originalText.text: My family and I had an amazing experience at this hotel. EVERYONE was super welcoming, kind and helpful. Rooms were immaculate and beautiful. We stood in a breath taking suite. There were fresh flowers in every room including the bathrooms. There was a welcome card with chocolates. Fridge was stocked with waters and sodas. The suite was spacious and inviting. The views were spectacular. Location was perfect. Staff was amazing!!! Everyone went above and beyond to make us feel welcomed and made it very clear they were available for assistance at anytime. A++++ hotel and staff!!! Best hotel I have stood in without a doubt!

text.text: My family and I had an amazing experience at this hotel. EVERYONE was super welcoming, kind and helpful. Rooms were immaculate and beautiful. We stood in a breath taking suite. There were fresh flowers in every room including the bathrooms. There was a welcome card with chocolates. Fridge was stocked with waters and sodas. The suite was spacious and inviting. The views were spectacular. Location was perfect. Staff was amazing!!! Everyone went above and beyond to make us feel welcomed and made it very clear they were available for assistance at anytime. A++++ hotel and staff!!! Best hotel I have stood in without a doubt!

originalText.text: The Sherry-Netherland provides you with everything you would expect a top tier luxury stay. The employees, concierge, help - everyone are incredibly warm and friendly from the moment you enter. It provides you with a anything and everything you could ask for making them offer simply a full service menu. If there is something they may not offer they will go out of there way to find an alternative or way to fulfill your request. Highly highly recommend. Beyond the top tier genuine customer service. The beautifully maintained building and history is something you should learn about during your stay. Locate is A+ as well. Across from Central Park. Far enough away from congestion of tourists but extremely close (walking distance) to meet all your shopping and NYC visit needs!
